H3.text: when 's the last time scotland won the calcutta cup. 2018

A4.text: They then defeated England in the Calcutta Cup with a 15–9 victory before succumbing to Italy, avoiding the wooden spoon only on scoring difference.

A5.text: Scotland also beat England 18–12 at home at Murrayfield to reclaim the Calcutta Cup.
